EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Webinar_PCF 2.5 APJ Update_Q219.Invite 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Invite: Pivotal Platform 2.5 First Look
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Don't miss your chance to register for the upcoming live webinar: Pivotal Platform Portfolio 2.5 APJ Update
Date: 10 April 2019 Time: 11am SGT / 1pm AEST
REGISTER HERE: https://www.brighttalk.com/webcast/14883/352034
Join Jared Ruckle, Director Product Marketing, Pivotal for a first look at the new capabilities released as part of the Pivotal Cloud Foundry (PCF) 2.5 release with live demos and expert Q&A. Attend this session and learn how you can:
Accelerate developer productivity with new capabilities that give you more control over your applications Improve operator efficiency and simplify administration of applications at scale Reduce risk by keeping your your platform in a secure, healthy state We look forward to seeing you there.
Regards,
Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
